faqs.question: How do I add money to my wallet?
faqs.answer: Go to Wallet → Add Money → Choose payment method and amount.

faqs.question: Can I use wallet balance for any order?
faqs.answer: Yes, your wallet balance can be applied to all orders, unless restricted.

faqs.question: How do I check my wallet balance?
faqs.answer: Open the Wallet section in your app to view your current balance.

faqs.question: Is wallet money refundable?
faqs.answer: Wallet balance is refundable only if credited by the platform or due to order cancellations.
